qs.quest: What does “Tranquility Wrapped in Blue” mean to you?
choices: Enjoying a day at the beach, glorying in the sun and sipping a delicious libation
Culinary explorations that help in the discovery of a new favorite dish
Relaxing in the comforts of a well-appointed accommodation
An invigorating hike to take in the scenic landscape
Interacting with amicable locals and making new friends

qs.quest: After the beach what is your favorite thing to do?
choices: I’d like to go back to my hotel and read a book or take a nap
I’ve worked up an appetite and am in need of an epicurean fix
Enjoy an evening of festivities amongst locals

qs.quest: What is the most important feature of an island?
How do you choose a vacation destination?
choices: I like to know the people and their heritage

qs.quest: What is your main interest in selecting a destination?
choices: Visiting places seen on TV, or in a movie

qs.quest: What are the most challenging problems that you face when choosing a destination?
Do you prefer to use a tourist guide services or tour independently?
Where do you get your information for choosing your next vacation destination?
choices: I look up travel deals on related websites
I stay up to date with travel media outlets
Bloggers and social media suggestions take precedence
Word of mouth and friend recommendations are a must!

qs.quest: What events would you like to see come to Anguilla?
Of the upcoming activations, what would you like to receive information for?
